reviewText: The presentation of this great new practice left a lot to be desired.  At times, it was indistinct and/or garbled

Sebastien Gendry's Laughter Yoga expertise seems unmatched. This DVD has deepened my understanding of how to lead a Laughter Yoga class with people who are chair-bound. It delivers a powerful format that is easy to follow and natural to use. It is an invaluable tool to anyone looking to lead special needs laughter yoga sessions.
